setup.headline: Setting Up Your 3D Background
setup.subHeadline: Professional installation guides for every aquarium configuration. From simple back walls to complex multi-chamber systems.
setup.proTipText1: Aquadecor backgrounds are made from lightweight material that won't stress your aquarium glass. However, water pressure means the background must be firmly attached using aquarium-safe silicone.
setup.proTipText2: Pro tip: Always check your silicone's expiration date before starting installation.
setup.configSubHeadline: Choose the perfect configuration for your aquarium placement and equipment
setup.ctaSubHeadline: Not sure which setup is right for your aquarium? Our team can help you design the perfect configuration.

1.title: Classic Single Wall Setup
1.description: The most popular configuration - covers the back glass with one equipment chamber. Perfect for standard aquariums against a wall.

2.title: Natural Crack Design
2.description: Elevate your setup with naturally integrated equipment hiding. Water enters through realistic cracks in the rockwork.

3.title: L-Shape Corner Mount
3.description: Maximize your aquarium's presence by covering the back wall plus one side. Ideal for tanks positioned next to walls.

4.title: Full Surround Immersion
4.description: Transform your aquarium into a viewing portal. Covers back and both sides, creating a complete underwater world.

5.title: Island Divider Setup
5.description: Place the background in the center as a natural divider with chambers or filters on either side.

6.title: Depth Illusion Design
6.description: Create dramatic depth by partially covering a black/navy foiled back glass. The background appears to float in space.

7.title: Multi-Wall Depth Design
7.description: Extend the depth illusion to one or both sides with foiled glass. Creates an incredibly immersive viewing experience.

8.title: Internal Filter Integration
8.description: Hide any internal filter regardless of location. Custom cracks and entrances match your specific filter type.

9.title: Stream Pump Cover
9.description: Classic back wall coverage with bonus: hide your stream pump behind a detachable rock.

10.title: Slim Bio-Filter Design
10.description: Flexible one-piece background with biological filtration space behind it. Fill the gap with bio-balls or Siporax.
